title: Early Summer Waltz
description:
Description :
        The possessive 'vinegar jar' top Ren Hong and the attention-seeking yet fearful of attention bottom Xie Yiwen, who are childhood friends, have a strong mutual crush. However, due to a confession before entering college, they created a rift. A year later, the two coincidentally joined the school's nearly disbanded drama club, which became an opportunity for them to gradually understand their true feelings and learn how to love!
